boots_dexterity.description:
Step 9m toward target direction. Increases Movement
Speed by 40% for 4s.

Increases Movement Speed by 60% and Attack Speed by
45% for 6s.

Dashes 6m in target direction. Gains 15% Critical Rate for
5s. Stacks up to 2 times.
Can be used again within 4s.

Quickly dash behind target, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%]
Physical Damage and increasing Basic Attack Damage by
40% for 6s.
Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges

Increases Movement Speed by 30%, enters Stealth after
1s, gaining +60% Movement Speed for 4s.
Using a skill, dealing damage or inflicting healing breaks
Stealth

Remove control effects and dash toward target direction.
Gain Control Immunity for 2s.
Can be used while skills are disabled

Leave a mark at current position and dash to the target
location. Upon arrival, deal [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical
Damage to enemies in range and reduce their Damage
Resistance by 15% for 4s. Can be cast again within 5
seconds to return to original position and gain 40%
Movement Speed for 3s.
